website_summaries.verdict: A solid set of brake pads that beats the rest of the pack on performance, versatility, and workmanship – what you'd expect from ACDelco.
pros: Quality brake pads by a trusted name in the automotive industry
Earns rave reviews from mechanics and gearheads who find them to be quiet, stable, and long-wearing
cons: Some issues with the clips not fitting properly and with missing hardware upon arrival, but otherwise many satisfied customers

customer_reviews.title: Much shorter stopping distance!
customer_reviews.text: I had some brake squeel on my 2009 Chevrolet Silverado. Turned out to be bent hardware but my pads were low anyway and this kit comes with new hardware. Very high quality pads. I suggest buying extra lube for the install as they only give you a tiny amount. I figured I would need to turn my rotors because I had some pulsation, but didn't have time. Turns out just replacing the pads was enough that the pulsation with away. My stopping distance is significantly shorter now too!
customer_reviews.author: BigRedCuda

customer_reviews.title: Great pads for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Been a while since I've used AC Delco brakes, my last two sets on my Tahoe were Duralast Max, one set lasted 60K the other the rotors warped in less than 14K. Since I Tow a boat quite a bit i wanted pads and rotors that were more heavy duty. These Delco pads are awesome. Quiet, stop fast and very easy to install. I had lots of stopping power when hitting the brakes towing last weekend. I will buy these again next time i have to change brakes!
customer_reviews.author: M. Stridde

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - Genuine AC Delco Brake Pads
customer_reviews.text: These are genuine AC Delco ceramic pads in genuine packaging. Great quality, easy to install on 2008 Silverado. No more squeaky brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Gramps

customer_reviews.title: Great fit/value on 2013 suburban.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and came with everything you need to do a brake job. Comes with a small package of grease, it's enough but I usually like to put a little more when doing brakes. Fits just as good as the OEM ones and is a few bucks cheaper. (Installed on 2013 Suburban)
customer_reviews.author: Tony10

customer_reviews.title: Same or better than factory.
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be the same or better quality than the factory pads. They come with everything you need to install them, including some lube to keep them quiet. I installed both sets in around 15 minutes and immediately noticed a difference. I use my truck to pull an RV and boat frequently so good brakes are important to me. I trust these pads to stop even if I have to slam on the brakes.
customer_reviews.author: HabaneroHotShot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for 2012 Silverado
customer_reviews.text: Exact match for the factory original front brake pads. I've never had brake pads last this long. I started to get a few squeaks & changed them, but the original ones with 65k miles on them were only about a quarter of the way worn compared to the new ones. Maybe they just got hard over time? Anyway, seems these would probably last at least 100k miles, which is amazing if they stay quiet that long.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan in Phx

customer_reviews.title: 2012 Suburban LTZ
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my application. For the DIYers, the calipers compressed easily with a cheap pair of wood clamps. Easy job. Worst part is jacking up the wheels and placing a stationary jack in place for safety. I’m all for redundant systems!
customer_reviews.author: Rob&Glo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it if you I want them to last
customer_reviews.text: Bought these pads about 2 months ago and they are already squealing and worn out they are not authentic ACDelco pads they are Chinese knockoff. , AC Delco uses a hologram on their labels so that you know you got authentic parts from them these are cheap pads you get what you pay for but will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: These pads work great! No damage to rotors and have great stopping ...
customer_reviews.text: These pads work great! No damage to rotors and have great stopping power. Will be buying these again when it’s time to change. There’s a reason the cheap auto parts stores warranty their pads for life...but not the rotors
customer_reviews.author: Matthew F.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality brake pads.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality brake pads. Installed these along with new OEM rotors to cure the pulsing issue. Made sure to “Bed” them properly so we will see how long they last. The factory installed pads were at 90,000 miles and still had above 75% remaining.
customer_reviews.author: Jess H.

customer_reviews.title: Top notch replacement brake pads
customer_reviews.text: What can one say? Great fit and finish. Fully equipped kit. Installation was straight forward. Pads work quietly and brake smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Open package with parts loose
customer_reviews.text: Package was open. Wasn’t sure it was complete until after I got into the job. Found it to be complete but some of the retainer hardware had to be manipulated back into shape before I could use them. This isn’t the first genuine AC Delco part I ordered from Amazon that had the package open. It’s starting to be the norm.
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: ACDelco is always the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Try to use AcDelco for all my chevy needs. Pads fit perfect come will all hardware that is needed and grease that is needed.
customer_reviews.author: adrian

customer_reviews.title: Really great pads
customer_reviews.text: I bought drilled and slotted rotors that came with supplied pads, they were so bad that I was afraid to stop! These Delco pads replaced those scary pads, and restored my braking to better than factory stopping power.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rutkoski

customer_reviews.title: Name brand and excellent parts.
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on my 2012 Chevy Silverado and I was very pleased with the quality and fitment. These breaks work very well. No noise and smooth stopping power when brakes are applied.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit

customer_reviews.text: Great pads, very solid braking with proper installation. Not the same as the ones installed in dealer but they work very similar.

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE, FAKE AC DELCO PADS!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE!!! These are NOT real AC Delco pads!!! They cut the plastic and swapped the pads with cheap knock offs! I will def be getting a refund!

customer_reviews.text: The squeal or screech the brakes make in the morning on a humid day when you first use them is embarrassing. Would not buy them again for this reason.

customer_reviews.title: Open package
customer_reviews.text: The package came open and the breaks were slightly broken from the edges. It is open shown in the pictures.

customer_reviews.title: Loud.
customer_reviews.text: Stop ok, but VERY loud. I applied all the recommended grease in the appropriate location and they still squeal loudly after many miles. Will be going with something else next time.

customer_reviews.title: Work great.
customer_reviews.text: Had a mechanic install these on my 2008 Silverado 1500 (subzero temps without a heated garage = worth paying for labor). They were impressed with the quality of the parts I brought in since most people bring them cheap junk to install. Work much better than the brakes that came with the truck. Glad I got these and saved a ton of money - about $90 total for odd and rotors through Amazon versus $270 for oem parts at the shop.

product_meta.title: ACDelco 17D1367CH Professional Ceramic Front Disc Brake Pad Set
product_meta.description: ACDelco Professional Ceramic Brake Pads are engineered to help resist corrosion and premature wear and are the high quality replacement ideal for many vehicles on the road today. They offer exceptional performance, and include noise-dampening shims where applicable. Independently tested using SAE J2784 standards, these pads deliver the fit, form, and function you expect from ACDelco. Their durable ceramic formulation uses less metal, providing high quality braking power in a quiet and low-dusting package. Also no curing is required. ACDelco Professional Ceramic Brake Pads are ready to be installed right out of the box. ⚠ WARNING: Cancer and Reproductive Harm - www.P65Warnings.ca.gov
feature_bullets: Tested to SAE J2784 for braking effectiveness, along with Noise/Vibration/Harshness (NVH) and durability/wear testing for assurance of quality
Ceramic, semi metallic, and organic formulas provide safety and reliability for a range of vehicle applications
Integrally molded : friction material molded to backing plate for bond integrity
Premium shims, slots, and chamfers help to diminish noise, vibration, and braking harshness
Stamped backing plate allows for proper pad movement within the caliper assembly, reducing noise, brake pulsation, and helps to protect against premature wear

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars358 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
